overview: All his life, African-American Renato has been raised in an Italian-American family. Completely unaware that he is Black, his life is upended when his birth parents materialize, causing Renato to examine what he true heritage is.
tagline: All his life, African-American Renato has been raised in an Italian-American family. Completely unaware that he is Black.
title: Homie Spumoni
